mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_description(swimming_pool, parking, restaurant, smoking, laundry_facilities, fitness_center) VALUES(#{swimming_pool}, #{parking}, #{restaurant}, #{smoking}, #{laundry_facilities}, #{fitness_center})
